  • Virus
  • Werewolf
  • Wraith

Killing

As the Werewolf, you can kill much like any killer.
However, when you kill, any nearby players also die.
Any player who dies to this will have their death reason as Mauled.

To balance this, you have a higher kill cooldown than anyone else.

  • Kill Cooldown
    • Set the Werewolfâ€™s kill cooldown
  • Maul Radius
    • Set the Werewolfâ€™s maul radius
  • Can Vent
    • : the Werewolf can vent
    • : the Werewolf cannot vent
  • Has Vision
    • : the Werewolf has Impostor vision
    • : the Werewolf does not have Impostor vision

From: ToUR
